text: This is a list of airports in Niger, sorted by location. __TOC__ == Airports == Airport names shown in bold indicate the airport has scheduled service on commercial airlines. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- valign=baseline ! style="text-align:left; white-space:nowrap;" | City served ! style="text- align:left;" | ICAO ! style="text-align:left;" | IATA ! style="text- align:left; white-space:nowrap;" | Airport name |- valign=top | Agadez | DRZA | AJY | Mano Dayak International Airport |- valign=top | Arlit | DRZL | RLT | Arlit Airport |- valign=top | Diffa | DRZF | | Diffa Airport |- valign=top | Dirkou | DRZD | | Dirkou Airport |- valign=top | Dogondoutchi | DRRC | | Dogondoutchi Airport |- valign=top | Dosso | DRRD | | Dosso Airport |- valign=top | Gaya | DRRG | | Gaya Airport |- valign=top | Goure | DRZG | | Goure Airport |- valign=top | Iferouane | DRZI | | Iferouane Airport |- valign=top | La Tapoa | DRRP | | La Tapoa Airport |- valign=top | Maine-Soroa | DRZM | | Maine-Soroa Airport |- valign=top | Maradi | DRRM | MFQ | Maradi Airport |- valign=top | Niamey | DRRN | NIM | Diori Hamani International Airport |- valign=top | Ouallam | DRRU | | Ouallam Airport |- valign=top | Tahoua | DRRT | THZ | Tahoua Airport |- valign=top | Téra | DRRE | | Téra Airport |- valign=top | Tessaoua | DRRA | | Tessaoua Airport |- valign=top | Tillabery | DRRL | | Tillabery Airport |- valign=top | Zinder | DRZR | ZND | Zinder Airport |} == See also == * Transport in Niger * List of airports by ICAO code: D#DR - Niger * Wikipedia: WikiProject Aviation/Airline destination lists: Africa#Niger == References == * * - includes IATA codes * Great Circle Mapper: Airports in Niger - IATA and ICAO codes * World Aero Data: Airports in Niger - ICAO codes * Aircraft Charter World: Airports in Niger Niger Airports Airports Niger
